case_title: ABDUL NABI and others vs GOVERNMENT OF BALOCHISTAN through Secretary Education, Quetta and others
respondents: GOVERNMENT OF BALOCHISTAN through Secretary Education, Quetta and others
legal_issues: Termination of services without notice or opportunity of hearing
Violation of principles of natural justice (audi alteram partem)
Fake appointment orders and service books
key_statutes: Balochistan Province Removal from Service (Special Powers) Ordinance, 2000

judgment_summary.findings: Unilateral inquiry conducted without show-cause notices or opportunity of hearing
judgment_summary.remand_instructions: Cases remanded to Secretary Education Balochistan for disposing representations within three months. Appellants allowed to file representations if not filed earlier.

inquiry_committee: Haji Abdul Manan (Deputy Director of Education, Balochistan Quetta)
remarks: Convictions of officials involved in issuance of fake appointment orders upheld by Supreme Court of Pakistan.
